[img] https://i.ibb.co/TMqXjnJ9/bosses-tittle.png [/img] [b] 13 new boss battles [/b] await your challenge! [list] [*] [b]1 FINAL BOSS![/b] [*] 10 Challenge Bosses! [*] 2 Special Bosses! [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/bgm8T5Xw/rooms-tittle.png [/img] [b] 2 new rooms [/b] are ready to be explored! [list] [*] [b]Astral Challenge[/b]: Battle a planet for treasures! There are two kinds: a Chapter 2-3 challenge and a Chapter 5 challenge. [*] [b]Lunar Pact[/b]: Break your hearts for high quality items! [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/LzpPv7vG/items-tittle.png [/img] [b] 23 new items + 16 new trinkets [/b] await to be collected! [list] [*] 10 Passives [*] 6 Actives [*] 7 Familiars [*] 16 Trinkets [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/k6chzHDP/challenges-tittle.png [/img] [b] 3 new challenges [/b] are ready to be beaten! [list] [*] [b] Tower of Babel [/b]: [b]Boss Rush[/b] & [b]Arena[/b] challenge [*] [b] True Solar System [/b]: [b]BALLS![/b] [*] [b] Escape the Everchanger [/b]: [b]Horror[/b] escape room challenge [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/bR13N31J/others-tittle.png [/img] [b] More stuff [/b] which I won't dedicate a section to!
[h1][b] Reach Sol the Absolute [img] https://i.ibb.co/cS5g4Zpy/soolol.png [/img] [/b][/h1] To reach Sol the Absolute [b]the two Astral Challenges[/b] must be completed during the run, and Isaac must enter the [b]Blue Chest[/b]. Alternatively, Sol can be found at the top of the [b]Tower of Babel on Ascended[/b] difficulty.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2722017893][b]Andromeda[/b][/url] has the ability to transform regular challenge rooms into astral ones using [b]Gravity Shift[/b]! (once per kind).
[h1][b] Mods with special interactions [/b][/h1] [h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] [b]MiniMAPI[/b] [/url] [/h2] Highly recommended [b]but not required[/b], without it mini-map icons won't show properly. [h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2722017893] [b]Andromeda[/b] [/url] [/h2] Unlocks for beating Sol with Andromeda and T. Andromeda, plus a special Gravity Shift interaction in regular challenge rooms. [h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2993558907] [b]The Future[/b] [/url] [/h2][spoiler]The stars are calling![/spoiler] [h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [b]Enhanced Boss Bars[/b] [/url] [/h2] Bosses have custom icons and health bars [h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872] [b]External Item Descriptions[/b] [/url] [/h2] Descriptions for most stuff in the mod
Addtional [i][b]small[/b][/i] interactions with the following mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851063440]Fiend Folio[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880387531]Revelations[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974704582]Fall From Grace[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2818356312]Tainted Treasure[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3010945909]Rune Rooms[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2609612697]Antibirth Runes[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2548296941]Godmode[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3416946312]Exodus[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2530772508]Alt Horsemen[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3297246061]Boss Butch![/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3343815332]Last Judgement[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3420129062]Dark Vaults[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3012430463]Epiphany[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2500963144]Eternal Edition[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2801120315]Arachna[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3169946719]Time Machine[/url]
